Articles.Content:
OK too much is too much... I admit defeat... RVE, EVE, SVE, Scatterer... I got lost...

I am running a stock solar system, a fair amount of MODS, and want to improve the look of things as I plan my next crash landing. I think I should be using SVE and Scatterer, and GEM for snap shot publishing, but after reading all the descipts I got confused. Any help would be appreciated

 

Alacrity
What exactly confuses you? Installing them? Using them?

11 hours ago, alacrity said:

OK too much is too much... I admit defeat... RVE, EVE, SVE, Scatterer... I got lost...

I am running a stock solar system, a fair amount of MODS, and want to improve the look of things as I plan my next crash landing. I think I should be using SVE and Scatterer, and GEM for snap shot publishing, but after reading all the descipts I got confused. Any help would be appreciated

 

Alacrity

 

I feel you. I tried to install the visual mods after about a month of playing, and couldn't figure it out for the life of me. A few pointers, Make sure you have the EVE shaders AND the configs, this stopped me dead in my tracks before.

Scatterer was an easy drag and drop for me, as for EVE I agree with @Andem you need both the EVE folder: which is the mod and boulderco which are the textures

EDIT: RVE is designed to work with real solar system and be realistic and SVE is the RVE clouds on stock planets

Edited May 5, 2016 by Kepler68

So the end of things...

Scatterer and EVE is the right answer

Alacrity
